word_mean: 切〔开取〕石术，〔结〕石切除术：切开管道或器官，尤指切开膀胱以除去结石的手术

sentence.Network_en: Of the 15 cases, 9 cases were undergone EST , 7 lithotomy, and another 9 ENBD.
sentence.Network_cn: 行EST9 例, 取石7例, ENBD9例.

sentence.Network_en: Conclusion: The modified lithotomy position may reduce the incidence of postoperative complications.
sentence.Network_cn: 结论: 改良摆放方法有利于减少截石位术后的并发症.

sentence.Network_en: Two patients were unable to assume a lithotomy position for the conventional cystoscopic procedure.
sentence.Network_cn: 有两位人因无法架脚或截石姿势以接受传统式的内视镜检查.
